QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, n.note_date, 'nlp_term:' + isnull(n.nlp_term, '') + ';nlp_term_attribute1:' + isnull(n.nlp_term_attribute1, '') + ';nlp_term_attribute2:' + isnull(n.nlp_term_attribute2, '') + ';nlp_term_qualifier:' + isnull(n.nlp_term_qualifier, '') as note_text, 'NLP_CUSTOM' as note_title, n.note_section, 40639387 as language_concept_id from {sc}.nlp_custom n JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND n.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
